website_summaries.verdict: If you want an attention-grabbing workout shoe, these are your top choice – color is the strongest feature. Otherwise, choose an alternative.
pros: Bright, eye-catching colors are the big draw for many customers
Breathable mesh upper with supportive synthetic leather overlays
cons: May run small, so keep this in mind when sizing

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy!
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes. Very comfortable for the price and cute colors. I wear a 9 in shoes for the most part, but always wear a 9 1/2 in sneakers - and these fit exactly as i'd hoped. I have high arches and these give good support.
customer_reviews.author: Domestic Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Size ran big for me, beautiful colors, so so comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright colors! The size recommended by Amazon (8 my usual size) is waay too big. I have to wear 2 pairs of thick socks. My seller had to pay for returns so I will keep them. Comfort level is 6 to 7 out of 10, if I wear them all day walking, feet get tired, I have other running shoes that are more comfortable. However, I am uplifted by the colors <3 and got them at reasonable price, only 21.99. So long as I dont wear them for miles & miles & just running errands, I am ok. Next time, I would probably get a 7 or 7 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: smiles

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT - FIVE STARS.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Soft cushioning inside, bright colors, great FIT. I wear a 9.5 med. and that's what I ordered and they fit great. I have adjusted the laces so I don't have to untie them to put my feet into the shoes. I glued clear rhinestones on the sides for added whimsy. I do not run in these shoes, and I do not wear them all the time. So far they have been a 5 star purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Star

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I have other pairs of multi colored shoes and get lots of compliments. The colors are vibrant and blend nicely together. I wear a size 9 and these in size 9 are perfect. They are also nicely cushioned and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marci H.

customer_reviews.title: NO ARCH!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no arch and threw the box out before realizing I wanted to return them. Bought 2 pairs and within 3 weeks of running in them, both ankles were swollen to the size of 12" softballs! Had to spend 6 weeks recovering in the pool working out.
customer_reviews.author: BellaGirl79

customer_reviews.title: So much fun to wear at the gym - I need a ...
customer_reviews.text: So much fun to wear at the gym - I need a bright spot to get me there! If I can feel fashionable while gasping for air on the treadmill, it makes the experience a bit more tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: Better than any $150 nursing shoe I ever bought. Best shoes I ever had !
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe...
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected only because I read other reviews. I wear a 9 but ordered a 10 because others said it runs small. The color is fun which is what caught my eye. Not as comfy as my Reebok memory foam shoes, but still feels good on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Hughes

customer_reviews.title: If you like cushion socks I suggest you buy 1/2 size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Very confortable shoes if I wear them with thin socks. If you like cushion socks I suggest you buy 1/2 size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: chuli

customer_reviews.title: ... is what I usually wear in sneakers and was super shocked to find when they arrived they are actually ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I ordered a 10 which is what I usually wear in sneakers and was super shocked to find when they arrived they are actually really roomy.... roomy enough that I would have ordered a 9.5. So far I really like them, the cushion is amazing and my feet don't hurt after working out. For the money a very very great product and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wilmoth

customer_reviews.title: Cute but didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and comfortable shoe. However they have worn out VERY quickly. In the picture you can see the “swoosh” in the leather part that covers the toes. It comes to a slight point right where the foot bends. This has caused a hole to form in the mesh part. Very sad about this since I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri N.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I have 2 pair and would purchase again. I wanted tennis shoes with memory foam and these don't disappoint. I'm not a runner but needed a cushion for my high arches, and heel pain. These do the trick with walking all day.
customer_reviews.author: MQ

customer_reviews.title: loved the look of the shoes
customer_reviews.text: loved the look of the shoes, nice and lightweight, bright colors. Returned original order, will be ordering in a size larger. Can't wait to get them
customer_reviews.author: winks mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them! Fila colors are so bright and vivid and are always very well made.
customer_reviews.author: EZMERELDA JO

customer_reviews.title: love the inside foot bedding
customer_reviews.text: love the inside foot bedding. spungy comfy for wearing at the gym. colors are fun. im kinda wide but these fit perfect.good sole, wide, thick.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SUPER comfy and cute. The memory foam makes wearing them all day with tons of walking a pleasure. They run a little small. I ALWAYS wear an 8 but had to get a 9 in this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these. Great fit. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CatheD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect perfect perfect
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. I will only buy Fila memory foam in the future. I was a huge fan of the sketchers memory foam, but this stuff is 110% better.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Perfect fit, can wear them all night (nightshirt) and my feet never hurt! Great color too :)
customer_reviews.author: D. Randles

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I need the rounded toe and these fit perfect. UnFortunately the one shoe string was cut almost through and there were no more shoes left in my size but Amazon was great and refunded some of my money for the inconvenience . Thankyou
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Memeory foam love!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved fila, I'm never going back to anything without memory foam! They keep my feet happy ALL day!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOve Fila Brand Shoes- Comfort is important to me- SOOOOO Comfy....
customer_reviews.author: Tami Holland-Davis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid more attention to reviewers stating the shoe runs small. I will be sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Betty R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these shoes! Will purchase Fila from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 12 days
customer_reviews.text: Uve only had for 12 days. I haven't washed them or anything and the soles broke off already!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I had Fila shoes before and was looking for something similar since the other pair got worn out. I was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and affordable. I recommend them for walking and running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are TERRIBLE! I bought them to work in (3 twelve ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are TERRIBLE! I bought them to work in (3 twelve hour shifts a week). I already have several holes in them just after two months of wear. Do not buy them'
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Bad insole !
customer_reviews.text: Insole wore down in a week . Wouldnt recomend buying the product .
customer_reviews.author: Koup

customer_reviews.title: They were comfortable the first day
customer_reviews.text: They were comfortable the first day, but wearing them for work the second day my feet began to feel the discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the style but wish you had other colors of my choice
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Nethaway

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors just what I need for dark Ohio ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors just what I need for dark Ohio winters to cheer me up....very comfortably size is right arch support is lacking but I have inserts
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Gunter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Shoes! I workout at the gym an hour a day and they are very durable and comfortable! LOVE the squishy pads inside!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Daley

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as my older Fila shoes. Could use more padding in the front of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: kj

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are somewhat comfortable, but I would advise a different purchase if ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are somewhat comfortable, but I would advise a different purchase if you have wide feet. I can wear them, but if they were a little wider they would be more comfortable for longer periods of time. The memory foam on the inside is inspired, and worth the cost. I just wish they were a tad wider.
customer_reviews.author: MTop Contributor: Cooking

product_meta.title: Fila Women's Memory Maranello 2 Running Shoe
product_meta.description:
This fila running shoe combines technical features and great styling. It provides cushioning, stability and absorbs road shock. Looks great with athletic and fashion apparel.

Fila began in 1911, in the small alpine town of Biella, Italy, a place renowned for manufacturing the world's finest textiles, and weaving fabrics with impeccable quality, true innovation and extraordinary beauty. Born of the city and its traditions, Fila is inexorably derived from Biella's dedication to artistry, luxury and elegance. This is our birthright, it's in our soul, and it defines our future. We continue to enrich the athletic experience by improving comfort and performance with Italian design, quality craftsmanship and refined materials. There is no feeling quite as luxurious as that of playing in Fila, and that is the reason for our existence. We create what is desired, not what is necessary. Not just enough, but more than you need. This is Fila.
feature_bullets: Lace-up running shoe featuring breathable mesh upper with supportive synthetic-leather overlays
